import { useContext } from "react" import "./loginStyles.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Context } from "../../context/context" export default function Login() { const useRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const { dispatch, isFetching } = useContext(Context) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch({ type: "LOGIN_START" }) } return (
Login
) }
